abstract_summ: A novel coronavirus, 2019-nCoV, has broken out and is propagating in China and the world . Authors propose a varying coefficient Susceptible-Infected-Removal model (vSIR) track the epidemic of COVID-19 in 30 provinces in China . They predict that Hubei province will reach its peak between February 20 and 22, 2020, and if the removal rate can be increased to 0.1, the epidemic will end in May 2020 .
